member.name: IDirectManipulationUpdateHandler.Update
member.summary: Notifies the compositor when to update inertia animation.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Defines methods for handling manipulation update events.
summary.div: Note When implementing a Direct Manipulation object, ensure that the implementation supports multithreading through thread-safe reference counting. For more information, see and .
